summary: After breaking the law of reanimating human corpses, young Watson has to either work for the government or face punishment. He has to go on a secret mission, to find the notes of Viktor Frankenstein, who reanimated the first human corpse.
cast: Clint Bickham|Anthony Bowling|Duncan Brannan|Justin Briner|Ben Bryant|Chris Burnett|Bradley Campbell|Clifford Chapin|Greg Dulcie|R. Bruce Elliott|Ricco Fajardo|Issei Futamata|Cris George|Caitlin Glass|Kenny Green|Jarrod Greene|Chris Guerrero|Todd Haberkorn|Nick Haley|Kana Hanazawa|Sean Hennigan|Yoshimasa Hosoya|Chuck Huber|Jeremy Inman|Kôji Ishii|Taiten Kusunoki|Houko Kuwashima|Morgan Laure|Jason Liebrecht|Andrew Love|Gregory Lush|Mike McFarland|Shin'ichirô Miki|Anastasia Munoz|Ayumu Murase|Phil Parsons|Orion Pitts|Jirô Saitô|Lindsay Seidel|Derick Snow|Micah Solusod|Takayuki Sugô|Yoshimitsu Takasugi|Kôji Takeda|J. Michael Tatum|Brad Venable|Kira Vincent-Davis|David Wald|Mark Walters|Christopher Wehkamp|Sarah Wiedenheft|Daiki Yamashita|Akio Ôtsuka
title: The Empire of Corpses
